  • Method Details

    • checkCoverage

      public static void checkCoverage(double target, javr.core.AvrInstruction... instructions) throws Exception
      Perform automated coverage analysis of a given instruction sequence. This sequence is first converted into a firmware image before being uploaded onto the tiny boy.
      Parameters:
      target - The target coverage (as a percentage).
      instructions - The program being tested.
      Throws:
      Exception - if something goes wrong.

    • checkCoverage

      public static void checkCoverage(double target, String filename, boolean timeout, boolean gui, int nThreads, int batchSize) throws Exception
      Perform automated coverage analysis of a given firmware file. The firmware is first loaded from the appropriate location and then uploaded into the TinyBoy.
      Parameters:
      target - The target coverage (as a percentage).
      filename - File name of firmware image
      timeout - Time limit
      gui - Flag to show Graphical User Interface.
      nThreads - Number of threads to use.
      batchSize - Batch size of jobs for each thread.
      Throws:
      Exception - If something goes wrong.

    • checkCoverage

      public static void checkCoverage(String name, javr.io.HexFile firmware, double target, boolean timeout, boolean gui, int nThreads, int batchSize) throws Exception
      Perform automated coverage analysis of a given firmware.
      Parameters:
      name - Name used for printing out report
      firmware - The firmware image being used
      target - The target coverage (as a percentage).
      timeout - Time limit
      gui - Flag to show Graphical User Interface.
      nThreads - Number of threads to use.
      batchSize - Batch size of jobs for each thread.
      Throws:
      Exception - If something goes wrong.

    • checkCoverageWithTimeout

      public static void checkCoverageWithTimeout(String name, javr.io.HexFile firmware, Double target, Boolean gui, Integer nThreads, Integer batchSize) throws Exception
      Perform automated coverage analysis of a given firmware.
      Parameters:
      name - Name used for printing out report
      firmware - The firmware image being used
      target - The target coverage (as a percentage).
      gui - Flag to show Graphical User Interface.
      nThreads - Number of threads to use.
      batchSize - Batch size of jobs for each thread.
      Throws:
      Exception - If something goes wrong.

    • printDisassembly

      public static void printDisassembly(javr.io.HexFile firmware, tinyboy.util.CoverageAnalysis coverage)
      Disassemble the firmware image in order to provide useful feedback. This is essentially provided to help with debugging, and to determine where the unreachable code is in a given firmware image.
      Parameters:
      firmware - The firmware file to be disassembled.
      coverage - The computed coverage which is included in the output.
